mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SCHEDULE_MEMBER (ID, MEMBER_ID, SCHEDULE_ID) VALUES (SEQ_SCHEDULE_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{scheduleId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBM.ID, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_PATH, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_NAME FROM TBL_SCHEDULE_MEMBER TBSM JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBSM.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID WHERE TBSM.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}
